articles.author: Sara Moniuszko
articles.title: Almost half of cancer deaths in U.S. adults could be prevented, new study finds. A doctor explains how. - CBS News
articles.description: Researchers at the American Cancer Society found more than 40% of all cancer deaths among U.S. adults could be linked to lifestyle risks that can be changed.
articles.content:
Want to do what you can to reduce your risk of cancer? A new study is pointing to some specific actions you can take — and how much difference it can make.
In the American Cancer Society study, publ… [+2766 chars]
